amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions which allow oil and gas exploration in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-49 to strike the provisions of the bill that will allow oil and gas exploration in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 231 (Roll no. 122).
